tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id INT,
    question_id INT,
    response_value VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (response_id) REFERENCES customer_survey_responses(response_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (question_id) REFERENCES survey_questions(question_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_surveys (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    survey_date DATE,
    satisfaction_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE surveys (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_name VARCHAR,
    description TEXT,
    active BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    response_date DATE,
    response_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    question_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    response_date DATE,
    response_text TEXT
);
